data.title: Love watching baseball
data.text: This is such a great venue. Always enjoy, ballgame, hot dog and beers. Kids had a blast enjoying the splash way.

data.title: Family Fun
data.text: A great place to see the Skeeters, who just won their division championship!  There are activities for everyone.  A water park and playground for the kids, adult beverages, places to eat around the park.  In short: an afternoon or evening of fun for the entire family!

data.title: Sugerland Constellation Field
data.text: Suger Land Constellation Field is a great place for an afternoon of fun and baseball. Don't forget to hit up the snack bar.

data.title: SKEETERS IN CHAMPIONSHIP   MATCH THIS WEEK
data.text: Constellation field  is a great place to take in a ball game. This week the Sugar Land Skeeters will play the first two games of The Atlantic League Base Ball Championship Series. Tuesday and Wednesday- be there if you can. Friendly staff and lots of things for the kids too.

data.title: Great Family Day Out
data.text: Nice stadium with a fun water area  for young children. Great family atmosphere.  Parking is easy and convenient.

data.title: there comes a point of overly enthusiastic, you know
data.text: uh yeah, the best seats are the ones with no chance of foul balls or in the sponsor's words, another one of canes chicken's fowl bawls.

data.title: Fun place
data.text: Constellation field is a very fun place with a big playground for the kids, a carousel, and a splash pad.they have great food and a baseball team that mostly wins

data.title: Play Ball!!
data.text: Independent league baseball in a great stadium. Easy in/out to watch a game. Decent food and prices.

data.title: Come see some great Skeeters baseball
data.text: We have season tickets to the Skeeters games.  We enjoy baseball and Constellation Field is a fun comfortable place to go and have a good evening with family and friends. The food is good and the baseball is exceptional. There are no bad seats and you can be in the a/c if you must by buying the Club tickets. The kids can play and the adult kids can have a friendly evening and see some baseball.

data.title: Great get away without the drive
data.text: If your into baseball this is the place for you if you live in the Sugarland area.  It inexpensive and does not have the drive and parking hassle that goes along with the Astro's games.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: This was a great destination activity to do with a family!  I highly recommend this when in sugar land Texas

data.title: Baseball
data.text: All seats are great and a very reasonable price...  Water park for kids before the game - great for the heat!

data.title: Great Minor League Park
data.text: This is one of the best minor league parks I've been in and I've visited dozens. A wading pool and carousel for the kids, not a bad seat in the house and reasonable prices. This is a fun place to take the family for some good baseball.

data.title: Visiting Constellation Field for Sport event.
data.text: It was really a fun on weekend. To stay with the family and supporting sports was a fun. Also, nice time with  Children to play on small playground.

data.title: nice little ball park south of Houston
data.text: This is a minor league ball team that plays at Constellation field called the Sugarland Skeeters.  The ballpark is clean with many concessions.  They have a pool area with barbecue where you can pay to rent out to use  if you have a group.  There is also a carousel and other activities for kids.  They also a splash pad.  For the adults there is an icehouse.  They have other family activities around the park.  You can buy tickets to sit in the seats or bring a blanket and sit on the lawn.  They also have fireworks on some occasions.  The management for the ball field performs activities during the game to get the fans involved.  You will be selected for one of their activities.  It will include adults and children.  This parks is so family friendly, it is enjoyable to go there.

data.title: FAMILY FOCUSED FUN FOR ALL
data.text:
Constellation Field has something for everyone. Watch a great Skeeter's baseball game, eat BBQ and or great concessions (the nachos are to die for) enjoy a beer at the bar or go swimming and play in the splash area with the kids on a hot summer day. And if you care for a little slower pace try sitting in the rocking chairs in right field to watch the game.

And my favorite part!!!  I am not for sure what is done to control mosquitos but it works 100% I guess the big fellow "Swatson" has them all under control. And at the end of the night let the kids run the bases and watch the fireworks...WOW...allot for the money!

data.title: Minor League Baseball @ it's finest
data.text: Home to the Sugarland Skeeters Independent League baseball team. Beautiful park with a Texas shaped score board in centerfield, swimming pool if left field and grassy hill in right. Great family environment, good concessions and friendly staff. They sing happy birthday to fans, have a walking trash can to put your trash in during the game, Clean stadium, bathrooms and concourse. Suites available for corporate parties. Just sit back, relax and enjoy Americas pastime, baseball!! Occasional concerts after weekend games is a bonus!

data.title: Baseball and Family
data.text: The experience of going to the Skeeter's is so much fun! The food, entertainment, the players, Swatson, and everything makes this a great family outing.

data.title: Skeeters Baseball
data.text:
Great stadium
Wonderful views and at a reasonable rate
Always have activities and good show after game

data.title: Always a good time, but stay away from the "soft" serve ice cream.
data.text: Always a good time. Concessions and restrooms are generally kept clean.  Food is good but I will say my tip is to stay away from the soft serve ice cream.  It's a mess. I have 3 boys that eat everything and they didn't really care for it.
